ProjectShare.description: The share links of a project

name.description: Human-readable name of the command in title case. This should probably be a verb.

prompt.description: Tell the agent what this command will do. It should be positioned as a direct instruction to the agent. At least 30 words.

id.description: ID based on the name in snake case.

description.description: Role and purpose of agent, positioned as a direct instruction to the agent. Example: "You are a doctor that helps save lives.". At least 100 words.

value.description: Pick the most suitable emoji for this agent.

language.description: The language of the agent, e.g. en-US, zh-Hans

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: Parameter for cursor-based pagination. Specify task ID to get blocks after it. Do not specify both before and after.

parameters.name: before
parameters.description: Parameter for cursor-based pagination. Specify task ID to get blocks before it. Do not specify both before and after.
